p: Moderate anticancer activity of M. longifolia EO on HepG-2, MCF-7, and A549 human tumor cell lines at a concentration of 100 Î¼g/mL has been reported by Abdel-Hameed et al. [ 86]. Under oxidative stress conditions, M. longifolia oil prevented cell death and inhibited the ROS production that was caused by H 2O 2 in a human astrocytoma cell line [ 42].
